scripts.start: npm run init-db && npx nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.sequelize-skeleton: npx sequelize init:models; npx sequelize init:config
scripts.init-db: cd /opt/lampp/bin/ && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS api_node_demo; CREATE DATABASE api_node_demo CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root && cd -
scripts.init-dockerize-db: docker exec -i toma-mysql mysql -uroot <<< 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS api_node_demo; CREATE DATABASE api_node_demo CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci'
